ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Where to go now?
ygData.msgSnippet: Unfortunately, druids don t have quite as easy a time as warriors, as more than one warrior will not hurt a group 50+, whereas more than one druid is usually
ygData.messageBody:
Unfortunately, druids don't have quite as easy a time as warriors, as more than one warrior will not hurt a group 50+, whereas more than one druid is usually seen as a waste of a group slot.  Plus, every time I zone into Karnor's I do /ooc Lvl 49 druid LFG and a split second later see /ooc Lvl 52 druid LFG, /shout Lvl 51 druid seeks group, and /ooc 52 druid LFG  :)  In other words, so many druids, so much competition
 
I'm thinking about going to TD to hunt Spirocs; I've seen them mentioned on message boards as decent exp/loot at high 40's, low 50's.  Has anyone ever hunted these?  If so, anyone got any tips?  I've never been to TD so don't really know what to expect (but I'm armed with a map!!)
 
Nymue
 
----- Original Message -----
From: The Mad Macinchaote
Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 8:46 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Where to go now?
 
SOmetimes its been that much here too, and sometimes I can /ooc that a 55 warr is LFG and before I've hit enter someone's asking me to join
----- Original Message -----
From: Victoria Wickham
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 8:44 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Where to go now?

I don't know about your server, but to get a group in KC it's at least a four hour wait on my server ;-P  Don't have that kinda time, I'm afraid ..
 
Nymue
 
----- Original Message -----
From: The Mad Macinchaote
Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 7:43 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Where to go now?
 
Go back to KC. A good group is worth the wait.
----- Original Message -----
From: Victoria Wickham
To: everquest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 8:23 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Where to go now?

I recently hit 49th with my druid.  A lot of the friends I made at lower levels (I am a grouping druid, didn't solo until level 35) have quit EQ and moved on, and my guild is made up of lower levels who aren't anywhere near able to group with me.  Where do you all suggest I go for exp and loot?  I'm not much of an explorer and so won't go to a zone I don't have a map of and preferably an escort (hehe).  I've tried Karnor's, but it's sooo hard to get a group there, and I got my face shoved through my head when I tried to kite in Burning Woods.  Any suggestions would be appreciated :)
 
Thanks,
Nymue
